videos.description: Collin Sexton pokes away the Aggies' pass and passes it ahead to Dazon Ingram who finishes with the layup.
videos.headline: Ingram finishes strong after 'Bama steal

videos.description: Texas A&M pushes it quickly upcourt off the loose ball and caps it with a huge jam by Robert Williams.
videos.headline: Aggies finish fast break with huge alley-oop

videos.description: Donta Hall goes up strong underneath the basket for the tip in off of Collin Sexton's missed triple.
videos.headline: Hall cleans up with tough tip-in

videos.description: John Petty spikes the ball away in traffic and then cleans up on the other end with an offensive board and tip-in.
videos.headline: Petty swats and cleans up

videos.description: Donta Hall makes use of a great pass from Collin Sexton and muscles through the defense for a layup and the foul.
videos.headline: Hall flexes his strength following layup

videos.description: Alabama's Donta Hall climbs the ladder and shakes the backboard on an impressive alley-oop from Dazon Ingram.
videos.headline: Hall brings the house down with massive alley-oop

videos.description: Duane Wilson comes down awkwardly after going up for a loose ball and limps off the court favoring his right knee.
videos.headline: Wilson heads to locker room with apparent knee injury

videos.description: Alabama knocks off No. 5 Texas A&M in the SEC opener thanks to  big games from Collin Sexton and John Petty.
videos.headline: 'Bama takes down Texas A&M in SEC opener
